#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(dji_controller_tst)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES "")
#set(EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../bin)

find_package(roscpp REQUIRED)
include_directories(${roscpp_INCLUDE_DIRS})

find_package(DJIOSDK REQUIRED)
include_directories(${DJIOSDK_INCLUDE_DIRS})

find_package(LinuxChrono REQUIRED)
include_directories(${LinuxChrono_INCLUDE_DIRS})

find_package(GeoMath REQUIRED)
include_directories(${GeoMath_INCLUDE_DIRS})

FILE(GLOB SOURCE_CPP ../include/*.cpp  common/*.cpp gimbal/*.cpp *.cpp)

add_executable(${PROJECT_NAME} ${SOURCE_CPP} gimbal/dji_gimbal.h)

find_package(jukovsky_ros REQUIRED)
include_directories( ${jukovsky_ros_INCLUDE_DIRS})

target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} ${roscpp_LIBRARIES} ${DJIOSDK_LIBRARIES}  ${LinuxChrono_LIBS} /usr/local/lib/libGeoMath_lib.a "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
